keys.app.description: An unofficial GUI app for the ChatGPT backend API.
keys.app.name: ChatGPT-GUI
keys.app.non_affiliation_disclaimer: {app.name} is in no way associated with, endorsed by, or otherwise affiliated with OpenAI.
keys.about.app.description:
{about.app.title}

{app.description}

{app.non_affiliation_disclaimer}

Version Info: major:%i, minor:%i, micro:%i, releaselevel:%s, serial:%i

Running On:
	%s
	%s %s

%s

{app.copyright}
keys.about.app.title: About {app.name}
keys.about.qt.title: About Qt
keys.information.authentication_success.title: Authentication Successful
keys.information.first_launch.description:
Welcome! Make sure to read the README to understand how to use this application. You can re-read it at anytime by navigating to "Help" in the toolbar and pressing "README".

If you prefer Dark Mode, you can change the current theme to "Breeze Dark" in Settings.
keys.information.first_launch.title: First Launch Dialog
keys.information.package_installed.title: Package Successfully Installed!
keys.information.upgrade_version.description:
A new version of {app.name} is available!

To download it, press the "{information.upgrade_version.upgrade}" button.
To ignore this popup, and prevent it from showing up in the future, press the "{information.upgrade_version.ignore}" button.

---------------

Latest Version: %s
Your Version: %s
keys.information.upgrade_version.title: Upgrade {app.name} Version
keys.warnings.empty_token.description:
There is currently no valid session, please login to your account, or set the session token value in Settings.

You will be unable to acquire new data until a new session is obtained.
keys.warnings.empty_token.title: No Session
keys.errors.authentication_failed.title: Authentication Failed
keys.errors.missing_package.description:
The action "%s" requires the "{0}" package, which is not currently installed.

Pressing "{errors.missing_package.install}" will install it using the following command:

"%s -m pip install {0}"
keys.errors.missing_package.title: Missing Package
keys.errors.package_install_failure.descripti:
The package "%s" encountered an error during installation. Installation may or may not have been successful.

Error: %s.
keys.errors.package_install_failure.title: Package Failed to Install
keys.errors.settings.import_failure.descripti: Could not import settings from "%s". Make sure both the file and the parent folder exist, and that the file contains valid TOML.
keys.errors.settings.import_failure.title: Import Error
keys.questions.create_shortcut.description: Please choose the location you would like the shortcut to be in.
keys.questions.create_shortcut.title: Shortcut Creation Tool
keys.questions.sign_out.description: Are you sure you want to sign out from %s? You will need to sign in again to access ChatGPT.
keys.questions.sign_out.title: Sign Out Confirmation
keys.gui.changelog_viewer.title: Changelog Viewer
keys.gui.exception_reporter.exception_list: List of all currently logged exceptions:
keys.gui.exception_reporter.title: Exception Reporter
keys.gui.license_viewer.title: License Viewer
keys.gui.readme_viewer.title: README Viewer
keys.gui.sign_in_dialog.title: Sign In
keys.gui.menu_bar.title: Menu Bar
keys.gui.status_bar.title: Status Bar
keys.gui.settings.title: Settings
keys.network.http.codes.400.description: Your search path has malformed syntax or bad characters.
keys.network.http.codes.401.description: No permission -- Your access token is most likely invalid.
keys.network.http.codes.403.description: Request forbidden -- You cannot get this resource with or without an access token.
keys.network.http.codes.404.description: No resource found at the given location.
keys.network.http.codes.405.description: Invalid method -- GET requests are not accepted for this resource.
keys.network.http.codes.406.description: Client does not support the given resource format.
